DOC.brief_summary: CaP Cement Equivalent Iliac Bone Graft Filling Large Metaphyseal Defects
DOC.brief_title: CaP Cement Equivalent Iliac Bone Graft Filling Large Metaphyseal Defects
DOC.detailed_description: Background : A bone graft iliac crest long gold standard fill void open wedge osteotomy . CaP bone cement consider possible alternative bone graft . Methods : 20 adult patient distal radius malunions dorsal deformity randomise intra-operatively bone graft ( 10 ) CaP bone cement ( 10 ) . Dorsal titanium lock plate use wrist stabilise cast 8 week . Follow-ups 24 month include VAS wrist iliac crest , grip strength , ROM bilaterally , Quick-DASH Gartland & Werley ` functional scoring system . X-rays CT scan take 8 wks , 3-6-12-24 mths .
DOC.criteria: distal radius malunion dorsal deformity , disability pain . age 18 year , bad health , inflammatory arthritis radiocarpal osteoarthritis .
